ADULTERY.Defintion: sex between a married man or woman and someone he or she is not married to

ALLIANCE.Defintion: a group of countries, political parties, or people who have agreed to work together because of shared interests or aims

ANNUL.Defintion: to officially announce that something such as a law, agreement, or marriage no longer exists

ASSURING.Defintion: to tell someone confidently that something is true, especially so that they do not worry

BACHELOR.Defintion: a man who is not married

BEHEADED.Defintion: to cut off someone's head, especially as a punishment

ELUDING.Defintion: if something that you want eludes you, you do not succeed in achieving it

EXECUTED.Defintion: kill someone as a legal punishment

EXECUTING.Defintion: killing someone as a legal punishment

EXECUTION.Defintion: when someone is killed as a legal punishment

GREASY.Defintion: covered with or full of fat or oil

OBSESSED.Defintion: unable to stop thinking about something; too interested in or worried about something

RUTHLESS.Defintion: not thinking or worrying about any pain caused to others ; cruel
